title: Emerald Blossom Diamond Haar: A Timeless Elegance
materials: G Color) and vibrant Emeralds (estimated 2.5 carats total). Adorned with lustrous South Sea Pearls. Finished with a protective Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
features: This contemporary Haaram design showcases intricate diamond settings forming a delicate floral pattern. Centralized Emeralds add a touch of royal green. The design incorporates flowing curves and symmetrical details, culminating in pearl drops for a soft, feminine touch. Features a subtle peacock motif at the necklace's focal point, a symbol of beauty and prosperity.
colors: accented with deep green emeralds and soft white pearls.
occasions: or as a statement piece for any special event. Its modern design makes it suitable for both traditional and contemporary attire.
description: This Haaram is a harmonious blend of modern design and traditional South Indian aesthetics. The high-quality diamonds and vibrant emeralds create a luxurious and eye-catching piece. The Hyderabadi Polish ensures long-lasting shine and durability, making it a cherished heirloom for generations to come. The subtle peacock motif symbolizes grace and adds cultural significance.
